html:
When an otherwise exempt employee is jointly-employed by two or more employers, each of which pays the employee on a salary basis as defined in 29 CFR part 541, the salaries may be combined for purposes of determining if the minimum salary requirement has been met.

29 CFR ยง 791.2(a)
